knowledge: AicroStrategy Protocol: AI-powered onchain system combining convertible bonds with hyper-leveraged Bitcoin accumulation strategies
Bitcoin Exposure: Treasury value directly tied to BTC's growth - the ultimate provably scarce asset
Convertible Bond Mechanics: Investors provide stablecoins - Acquire bonds - Convert to $AiSTR if price exceeds strike at maturity - Or redeem stablecoins
Treasury Growth Loop: 1) Issue bonds 2) Buy BTC 3) Deploy in DeFi strategies 4) Compound gains
Risk Management: AI agents monitor markets 24/7, adjusting leverage (1-5x) based on volatility signals
Example Scenario: 2,000 USDC bond with $1.15 strike converts to $AiSTR if price >$1.15 at maturity - otherwise returns principal
Strategic Advantage: Combines Bitcoin's scarcity with DeFi yield generation - MicroStrategy on blockchain steroids
Institutional Protection: Bond redemption process automated via smart contracts - no counterparty risk
Protocol Synergy: Every deposited stablecoin increases BTC treasury, creating reflexive $AiSTR value support
Leverage Strategy: Supply BTC - Borrow stablecoins - Buy more BTC - Repeat
